entry.title: Photos Post 35: Special Events (after 1975), Part 15
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo of the special event 1904-0000 Public Program, India (workshop, touching with both hands, mike, seeker, Sahaja Yogi, wall, right view) has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 1904.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
